text: Hatem Ali () (2 June 1962 â€“ 29 December 2020) was a Syrian television and movie director and actor. His career began in 1988. He was born in Fiq, Syria. He was known for his television roles in Al-Taghreba al-Falastenya, Salah Al- deen, and Omar TV series. Ali died on 29 December 2020 in Cairo from a heart attack at the age of 58. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1962 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Syrian actors Category:Egyptian movie actors Category:Egyptian television actors Category:Movie directors Category:Television directors Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Hatem Ali
